title: How Person of Interest Predicted The Future
author: The Premise
comment: There is very little recognition for this brilliant show.

Still one of the most intelligent series I've ever seen on TV.  Glad I caught all 5 riveting seasons of it.  I miss Reese n Finch. This show was incredibly prescient. Jonathan Nolan is a wonderful mind.
"can you hear me"? Most under-rated series ever!

I can't believe this video has 3k views.  This show is so CRIMINALLY underrated. Its one of the best series i've watched. It opens so many discussions and goes beyond to what the show originally was intended to be. Its just perfect and I just want to cry because It's so underrated.
The series is way ahead of our time.Its a pure work of Genius
description:
A look at how Person of Interest explored AI before it was cool. 

Music by Epidemic Sound
